scripts.build:circuit:compile: circom circuits/withdraw.circom --json --r1cs -o build/circuits && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuits/withdraw.r1cs
scripts.build:circuit:setup: npx snarkjs groth16 setup build/circuits/withdraw.r1cs build/circuits/powersOfTau28_hez_final_18.ptau build/circuits/circuit_0000.zkey
scripts.build:circuit:bin: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey -i build/circuits/circuit_0000.zkey -o build/circuits/verification_key.json
scripts.build:circuit:contract: npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/circuit_0000.zkey build/circuits/Verifier.sol
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuits && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:bin && npm run build:circuit:contract
scripts.build: npm run build:circuit && npm run build:contract && npm run build:browserify
scripts.flat: npx truffle-flattener contracts/ETHTornado.sol > ETHTornado_flat.sol && npx truffle-flattener contracts/ERC20Tornado.sol > ERC20Tornado_flat.sol
